title: A fragrant flower blooms with dignity
description: Chidori High is a boys’ school that takes in the dregs of society with the lowest grades. Next door stands Kikyo Girls’ High, where the wealthy, high-class families send their precious daughters. Chidori second-year Rintaro, who has a fierce face but a gentle heart, is helping at his family’s patisserie when he meets a girl named Kaoruko. The two hit it off right away…

title: Jade Dynasty
description: Zhang Xiaofan, who was tragically orphaned overnight, was accepted as a disciple by Qingyunmen. After five years of hard training, he excelled in the martial arts of the Seven Vessels of the Mastermen. Senior sister Lu Xueqi was in danger and met Baguio, the woman who rescued the demon sect. At the same time, new dangers were also waiting for him.
